lines.text: Last time on Gun City, a broad city, the Uncle's Falcon. The boys leveled up. Grinch hunter,
Blotoss Pist, tapped into the mystic powers of the Lorax and learned how to create an impeccable
disguise. Force user, Patrick Yoda, chose the path of the Jedi Counselor and learned how he
he can bring peace in a moment during combat.
Abomination Ray William Johnson chose the dark path of the Bazinga, gaining incredible strength
but at the cost of growing a little boy's haircut and becoming allergic to the sun.
Once they all met with Ray William Johnson's doctor, these hotshot detectives tried to sell
their friend Patrick Yoda into slavery to see if they could make 10 million dollars
off his strong Yoda body.
They murdered an innocent, which caused Sullivan the frog to freak the fuck out and bring them
to his cousin John Carlos, a greasy lowlife who was always looking for some of that techno
slime.

Suckler, who can help them get into Da Matrix too.
In exchange, they gave him some Primo Technoslime materials.
